definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
old-fashioned square table to seat eight people

sentences.english: Case of the table with the biggest difference is that dioica and face.
sentences.chinese: 案，案與桌的最大不同，在於腿子和麪的關係。

sentences.english: Tabletop displays commercially available are the size of a coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 商用版的桌面顯示器有一張咖啡桌那麼大。

sentences.english: When I dine in a restaurant, I love a tcapable to myself.
sentences.chinese: 我上飯館喫飯時喜愛一獨立個體佔一張桌。

sentences.english: At the banquet table, I had the good fortune to sit vis-a-vis an old school chum.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸和一位昔日的老校友坐在宴會桌的對面。

sentences.english: Dioica side of the table and into a straight line, mostly at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 桌的腿子與面成直線，多爲直角。

sentences.english: Today we bought a ping pong table so we can all practice daily at home.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們買了乒乓桌，每天可在家裏練習打球。

sentences.english: Mr. Xu tried to courteously reject, but Qing Qing has already put dishes and fruits on the table.
sentences.chinese: 許仙想推辭，卻見青青已經把瓜果菜餚擺上了桌。

sentences.english: The magician shows a corked small clear glass bottle on the table.
sentences.chinese: 魔術師顯示一個被塞住的小清楚的玻璃瓶在桌。

sentences.english: What an amazing looking coffee table this one is.
sentences.chinese: 這是一款有着多麼迷人外觀的咖啡桌啊。

sentences.english: Xuxian wanted to refuse but Qingqing had allocated dishes and fruits on the desk swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 許仙想推辭，卻見青青已經把瓜果菜餚擺上了桌。

sentences.english: Thou shalt prepare also four golden rings, and shalt put them in the four corners of the same table over each foot.
sentences.chinese: 還要作四個金環，將這些金環安在桌四腳的角上。

sentences.english: People at other tables stared. Ms.
sentences.chinese: 其他桌的客人紛紛對他們側目而視。

sentences.english: I found a wallet in the desk.
sentences.chinese: 我鑰裎桌裏發現了一個錢苞。

sentences.english: I used to bring my dog and he slept under the table.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經帶過我的狗來上課然後它就睡在桌下面。

sentences.english: EffectThe magician gets an assistant to lie on the table using hypnotism .
sentences.chinese: 作用魔術師使助理說謊在桌使用催眠狀態。

definition: old-fashioned square table to seat eight people
food and drink/food to accompany wine
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
